title: OCE Server Maintenance March 6th - 8th.
body:
Hey everyone!

Heads up on maintenance happening within our datacenters from ~1am-7am AEDT (Sydney time) on March 6, March, 7, and March 8 that could affect the OCE servers. Since we're doing testing on redundant systems, we're hopeful that gameplay won't be impacted, though we'll be keeping a careful eye on player impact during the maintenance windows. If all goes well, no one will even notice it ever happened \o/

For any changes, stay tuned to the Service Status Page, or right here on boards!

Cheers!
Mindstar

replies.body: Hi, have a problem that the latency rise a lot during this maintenance and it remains until now, how to fix it?

Update speeds are horrendous.

50kbps down (speed test shows connection gets 22mbps so it isnt at my end).

for a 9 gig update, we'll be done in 2,900 minutes which is only ....... 48 hours ......
I am having the same problem as GrimReaper. It's been happening for about 2 hrs now

Hey guys, have an issue where my last game ended and would not bring up the stats page or honor ability. So i hit skip waiting for stats.  After that it will not allow me to start a new game. I closed the launcher and opened again and it takes me back into looking for the previous game I was in that had finished, rinse repeat. 

Not worried, just letting you know of the bug.

Nope, made a post in the help/support forum as well!

Just tried again and it has started looking. will keep you posted on if it actually finds a game or not.
It's letting me queue again but didn't give me the win credit so wew lad.

Just played a game and the stats wernt loading so I skipped them, came back my que wouldnt start so i relogged and it tried to tell me im still in a game. I repeated this process about 5x and even restarted my pc. Nothings working I would appreciate feedback. Oh and i done the full repair 3 times.{{item:3025}}
Hey thanks for the info.  The maintenance itself went on with no impact, but we'll check things out now to see if something else has happened.
Game ended over an hour ago and it's still saying it's in progress. Fix your shit.

The game play is impacted it seems Memestar. Multiple drop outs last few games.

Edit: iPrimus reports 'degraded' impact for WA, though nothing for SA. Could still possibly be related to this rather than server upgrades..
